entry.body:
import Details from "@w/Details.astro";
import TradingView from "@w/TradingView.astro";
import TabMenu from "@w/TabMenu.astro";
import TabData from "@w/TabData.astro";

## Information

Ethereum is a PoS blockchain eco-system that provides smart contract functionality.

<TabMenu first="chart" data={["settings", "options", "exchange", "reports", "notes"]}>
  <TabData tail="block" data="chart">
    <TradingView data="bitstamp:ETHUSD" />
  </TabData>
  <TabData data="settings">Settings</TabData>
  <TabData data="options">Options</TabData>
  <TabData data="exchange">Exchanges</TabData>
  <TabData data="reports">Reports</TabData>
  <TabData data="notes">

## Notes

These are the collection of notes for the Ether MDX Document.

### Log

- [x] Add Charts for ETHUSD
- [ ] Add tabs with charts!
- [ ] Multi Currency support for Charts?

#### Journal

<Details data="2023-04-14">Testing the charts for Eth</Details>

</TabData>
</TabMenu>

data.title: Ethereum
data.description: Ethereum is a decentralized smart contract blockchain system.
data.author: KBVE Team
